title: Breville -- The Crystal Clear™
description:
Breville The Crystal Clear Glass Electric Kettle - BKE595XL

A clean taste starts with clean water. How do you ensure a more pure boil? With the natural purity of glass -- easy to see, easy to clean.

The Crystal Clear™ has a large capacity cordless jug made of German SCHOTT glass. Its high power 1800 watts means faster boiling. Ease of mind matches ease of use -- everything touching water is BPA free; the wide, soft-opening lid prevents splashes and the safety auto shut-off prevents boil-off.

So simply elegant, you may want to watch water boil.
